scripts.dev: npm run setup && npx nuxi prepare && nuxi dev playground --open
scripts.dev:build: npm run setup && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=7000 nuxi build playground
scripts.dev:prepare: npm run setup && nuxt-module-build --stub && nuxi prepare playground
scripts.dev:generate: npm run setup && nuxt-module-build build --stub && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=7000 nuxi generate playground
scripts.release: npm run lint && npm run prepack && changelogen --release && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.setup: npm install && npm i --save-dev usebootstrap-docs@latest nuxt-dynamic-route@latest
scripts.deploy:cf: npm run dev:generate && npx wrangler pages deploy playground/.output/public --project-name usebootstrap
scripts.update: npx nuxi upgrade -f && ncu --interactive && npx nuxi dev --open
